class.rdfs:comment: Used to describe a ticket to an event, a flight, a bus ride, etc.
class.rdfs:label: Ticket

schema:dateIssued.rdfs:comment: The date the ticket was issued.
schema:dateIssued.rdfs:label: dateIssued

schema:issuedBy.rdfs:comment: The organization issuing the ticket or permit.
schema:issuedBy.rdfs:label: issuedBy

schema:priceCurrency.rdfs:comment: The currency of the price, or a price component when attached to [[PriceSpecification]] and its subtypes.\n\nUse standard formats: [ISO 4217 currency format](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217), e.g. "USD"; [Ticker symbol](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_cryptocurrencies) for cryptocurrencies, e.g. "BTC"; well known names for [Local Exchange Trading Systems](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Local_exchange_trading_system) (LETS) and other currency types, e.g. "Ithaca HOUR".
schema:priceCurrency.rdfs:label: priceCurrency

schema:ticketNumber.rdfs:comment: The unique identifier for the ticket.
schema:ticketNumber.rdfs:label: ticketNumber

schema:ticketToken.rdfs:comment: Reference to an asset (e.g., Barcode, QR code image or PDF) usable for entrance.
schema:ticketToken.rdfs:label: ticketToken

schema:ticketedSeat.rdfs:comment: The seat associated with the ticket.
schema:ticketedSeat.rdfs:label: ticketedSeat

schema:totalPrice.rdfs:comment:
The total price for the reservation or ticket, including applicable taxes, shipping, etc.

Usage guidelines:

* Use values from 0123456789 (Unicode 'DIGIT ZERO' (U+0030) to 'DIGIT NINE' (U+0039)) rather than superficially similar Unicode symbols.
* Use '.' (Unicode 'FULL STOP' (U+002E)) rather than ',' to indicate a decimal point. Avoid using these symbols as a readability separator.
schema:totalPrice.rdfs:label: totalPrice

schema:underName.rdfs:comment: The person or organization the reservation or ticket is for.
schema:underName.rdfs:label: underName
